author: Times Of India
title: Some community spread in hotspots: AIIMS chief
description: There may be some community spread of Covid-19 in hotspots and these areas need to be monitored closely to prevent community transmission of the virus, AIIMS director Dr Randeep Guleria said on Monday. “What the AIIMS director has said is not in variance with…
